activities:
CloudLock offers the cloud security fabric for the enterprise. The cloud-native security service provides customers the only complete, risk-appropriate, and people-centric solution to protect data, reduce risk, achieve compliance, manage threats and increase business productivity in the cloud. 

Certain sections of the CloudLock website users can choose to supply personal information such as: first and last name, company name, email and phone number
